name: Witch's Brew (Tapio Vähä-Vahe, Hummingbirdyy)
description:
Witch's Brew is a short puzzle game made in 4 days for Finnish College Jam 1. In the game, you must move rocks and different colored cauldrons to proceed in the levels . Some of the cauldrons have their own special abilities.

Instructions:

To push blocks move toward them and press space. To pause the game press the escape key.
